nodes.text: The OHS2132-04 system was located in the Ash Worlds sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. Between 25,120 BBY and 25,096 BBY, it was known as the Ulonsus system and was situated in the Kiirium Reaches region, a part of the empire of the Tionese conqueror Xim. During that time, the Ulonsus system was connected by hyperlanes to the Balshebr, Pakuuni, and Xoraes systems, and Xim moved his forces from Pakuuni to Ulonsus and then to Xoraes.
The OHS2132-04 system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the system in grid square T-7.
